resources.string: Choose the items you are most intersted in

Is your closet filling up with countless pairs of shoes? Whether you have a penchant for knee high leather boots, six inch Louboutins or casual sneakers, your passion for shoes is so strong that you\'ve decided to open a shoe shop. From learning about market trends to writing a stand-out business plan to attract investors - there are many factors to consider before embarking on your entrepreneurial adventure. In this guide on how to open a shoe shop, you\'ll find everything you need to know about how to kickstart your venture. Want to see your shoe shop succeed? Then read on!
